text: Wood Pigeon (Persian title: Toughi - ) is a 1970 Iranian drama movie directed by Ali Hatami and starring Behrouz Vossoughi, Bahman Mofid, Afarin Obeysi, Naser Malek Motiee, Zhaleh Olov, Hamideh Kheirabadi. == Other websites == * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Ali Hatami Category:1970 movies
title: Wood Pigeon (1970 movie)
